SEARCH
Package Controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Controller.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Game extends Object implements Runnable
This class handles all the game execution. It instances all the game's model and controller.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      With this method starts the execution of the game.

    • run

      public void run()
      This class contains the game loop. It controls time between each model update, if too much the model is updated again, reaching 120 updates per second. The same thing is done for redesigned view, 60 updates per second.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

      public static Game getInstance()
